alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 3:39PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong winds will continue across portions of northwest Nye county this afternoon... Strong winds will remain over portions of northwest Nye county this afternoon. Automated weather sensors are showing southwest winds of 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mpg across this area. Patchy blowing dust is possible due to the strong winds which could reduce the visibility to one mile in spots. In addition, crosswinds can cause high profile vehicles to become unstable. If driving across US Highway 6 or 95, or the various state routes in northwest Nye county, please use caution. Winds are expected to diminish after 7PM this evening. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
